open parentheses 3 x close parentheses to the power of 2 space end exponent cross times space open parentheses 3 x close parentheses to the power of 2 space end exponent equals open parentheses 3 x close parentheses cross times open parentheses 3 x close parentheses cross times open parentheses 3 x close parentheses cross times open parentheses 3 x close parentheses
